titleStmt.title: Some small faults are escaped in the Presse, which I heartily desire the courteous Reader, according to these di∣rections to correct.

analytic.title: Some small faults are escaped in the Presse, which I heartily desire the courteous Reader, according to these di∣rections to correct.

monogr.title: Certaine choise grounds, and principles of our Christian religion : with their seuerall expositions, set forth in way of questions, and answers: wherein the people of the parish of Northiham, in the county of Sussex, haue beene catechized, and instructed, for the settling o their hearts and mindes, in the mysteries of saluation, and for their better preparation to the Lord's Supper. Now published for their sakes, and for the futher vse of the Church of God. By Iohn Frewen, minister of the Word of God, in that particular congregation
monogr.author: Frewen, John

div.head: Some small faults are escaped in the Presse, which I heartily desire the courteous Reader, according to these directions to correct.
div.p: PAge 6. lin. 24. for which, read what. p. 13. l. 23. in stead of with, r. for p 25. l. 15. for absolute, r. resolute. p. 29. l. 15. for is is, r. it is. p. 34. l. 19 r. towards the marke. p. 46. l. 9. r of • ow corrupt. p 134. l 6 for he, 1. she. p. 214. l. 22. for by, 1. with. p. 254. l. 8. for Euangelist, r. Euangelists. p. 261 l 24. r. in which sentence. p. 300. l. 23 for confirme, r. affirme. p. 3 • 9 l. 21. for is, r. as. p. 361. l. 21. r. so far. p. 383. l. 22. for labour, r. looke.
